name: Social Distancing - A Crash Course
description:
You are Bob. You're on a nice morning walk in the city, but beware! There are a lot of people on the streets, don't get too close! If you do, you might catch something, or spread it further! You can talk to people and have them help you on how best to play, but bear in mind that not all people are to be trusted, some might in fact give you  some "fake news". Help Bob keep the curve low!  Good luck!

Made by Oskar Bladh, Deborah Carlander and Carl Olander.
